meanings.definition: One of two or more available possibilities.
meanings.sent1: She considered the alternative of taking the bus instead of driving.
meanings.sent2: Having a backup plan is always a good alternative.
meanings.sent3: When faced with the choice of cake or pie, he jokingly said his alternative was to eat both!
meanings.sent4: The alternative of going to the beach instead of the mountains was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The alternative of studying at the library or at home made her decision easier.

meanings.sent1: His alternative was to either stay home or go out with friends.
meanings.sent2: Having multiple alternatives can make decision-making more challenging.
meanings.sent3: The alternative of having pizza for dinner again was met with cheers from the kids.
meanings.sent4: She saw the job offer as a great alternative to her current position.
meanings.sent5: The alternative of choosing between red or blue shoes was a tough decision for her.

meanings.definition: Different from the usual or conventional.
meanings.sent1: The alternative route was faster than the main road.
meanings.sent2: Her alternative style of dressing always turned heads.
meanings.sent3: His alternative way of solving the puzzle left everyone impressed.
meanings.sent4: The alternative perspective shed new light on the situation.
meanings.sent5: The alternative ending to the story was unexpected but satisfying.
